name: Tag Checker bot
description: A bot to hide the Sender of Messages

Group1_name.description: Your First Group's name where you want to check user's tags.

Group2_name.description: Your Second Group's name where you want to check user's tags.

Group3_name.description: Your Third Group's name where you want to check user's tags.

unmute_command_1.description: A command name to unmute users who has been muted in the first group. (write the name without the '/' symbol)

unmute_command_2.description: A command name to unmute users who has been muted in the second group. (write the name without the '/' symbol)

unmute_command_3.description: A command name to unmute users who has been muted in the third group. (write the name without the '/' symbol)

Group1_id.description: Your First Group's id where you want to check user's tags.(must include -100 in front)

Group2_id.description: Your Second Group's id where you want to check user's tags.(must include -100 in front)

Group3_id.description: Your Third Group's id where you want to check user's tags.(must include -100 in front)

Bot_url.description: The bot's telegram link. Ex:-https://t.me/your_bot?start=start  Note:- Include '?start=start' at the end of the url!

Tag_Name.description: The Tag name you want to set for checking

START_MSG.description: Enter the message you want to get displayed when users press /start

Log_Group_id.description: Make a log group to save the details of who has been unmuted. Input the group id here.(must include -100 in front)!
